name: ghostium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows a Pokémon to use the Z-move equivalents of its Ghost moves.
short_effect: Held: Allows a Pokémon to use the Z-move equivalents of its Ghost moves.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Ghost-type moves to Z-Moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Ghost-type moves to Z-Moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Ghost-type moves to Z-Moves.
